title: Paathukkuren Lyrics Rubaai
stanzas:
Paathukkuren Song Lyrics #Rubaai
#DImman #SathyaPrakash 

Paathukuren unna
nallaa paathukuren.
paathukuren rendu
kannaa paathukuren.(2)

una pesaama 
paathukuren
una pesacholli
paathukuren

naan thoongaama
yaengaama neengaama
paathukuren

ullathula unna
paathukuren.
naan ullavara unna
paathukuren. (2)

Paathukuren unna
nallaa paathukuren.
paathukuren rendu
kannaa paathukuren

iruttula velichama
una arinjaene
posukkunu usurayum
thara thuninjene

theru oara devatha
neetheene.
una paathu
aamabal aanene

kumari un nenappaala
karanjene
tharayilum thalakeelaa
alanjene

nee kannaala
en roatta
vayakaadaa 
velanjaenae..

Paathukuren unna
nallaa paathukuren.
paathukuren rendu
kannaa paathukuren

Mazhayilum veyilium
koda pudippene
manasula una netham
padam eduppene

edhir paarpu yedhum
illaama
thuli kooda thaandiyum
sellaama

usurula mani pola
unak koppaen
nenappula velagaama
mugam paarpaen

un thaayaaga naan maari
thavaraama adakaappen

Paathukuren unna
nallaa paathukuren.
paathukuren rendu
kannaa paathukuren

Paathukuren unna
nallaa paathukuren.
paathukuren rendu
kannaa paathukuren.(2)

una pesaama 
paathukuren
una pesacholli
paathukuren

seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Rubaai, D Imman, Sathya Prakash, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
